amendment.description: Amendment makes available up to $5.9 million from balances of direct loans in the rural housing insurance account for rural rental assistance agreements and allows priority to prospective tenants who are residing in temporary housing provided by FEMA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the Secretary may use up to $5,986,197 for rental assistance agreements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clayton amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
